title: Quick Question About Decay
body:
Hey guys,

I achieved Plat 5 on October 11, and since schoolwork piled up I decided to leave it at that for this season and continue next season.

I know you have 28 days before the decay starts so, yesterday I played 2 ranked solo games.

Does this mean, I now have another 28 days from yesterday? Because then I wouldn't have to rank until season end.

Thanks!

replies.body: Congrats on Plat, that's great and a lot of hard work!  Kazutadashi provided some solid resources, but yet!  Once you play a ranked game, it will be 28 days from that match.

Yes, it is marked by 28 days of inactivity, which means after a win or a loss you have 28 days until you decay. See: [Decay](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3q1).
